channel.title: Turmoil Power
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://img46.imageshack.us/img46/9179/turmoilpowerrs.jpg[/img][/center]
Turmoil Power was Created as an Idea, to be one of the first RuneScape Private Servers to Prosper, without failing within the three month probation period. Turmoil Power will be striving to be one of the Top RuneScape Private Servers of 2011. Turmoil Power is going to be a stable Server, with loads of fun features.
[center][img]http://img209.imageshack.us/img209/4662/summaryi.jpg[/img][/center]
So you may be asking, Why get evolved with this Development? If you are enrolled, with Turmoil Power you will earn a percentage of equity with inside the future company. I am trying to start out the server and have not made any sort of leap to decide on what the server can we capable with. I am looking for a Co-Owner, With knowledge of how the majority of Private Servers Work, as long as the following:
-[i]Webmaster[/i] -[i]Co-Owner[/i] -[i]Co-Coder[/i] -[i]Client Coder[/i] -[i]Promoter [/i]
[center][img]http://img201.imageshack.us/img201/304/updatesv.jpg[/img][/center]
-Fixed this Thread -Added some Pictures, to look more justifiable -Purchased Copyright for TurmoilPower
[center][img]http://img12.imageshack.us/img12/5066/mediap.jpg[/img][/center]
There will be Pictures added very soon, as I am currently trying to Throw together the thread; at the moment.
[center][img]http://img13.imageshack.us/img13/4504/contactwwq.jpg[/img][/center]
[b]Skype:[/b] x.Eper.x [b]Moparscape:[/b] Gizmo1m

item.title: Turmoil Power
item.dc:creator: @Gizmo1m Gizmo1m
item.description:
@Gizmo1m wrote:

[quote=“Kono-chan, post:11, topic:381428”][quote author=Gizmo1m link=topic=477240.msg3491561#msg3491561 date=1296965854]

Not to offend here, but every server is “striving to be the best server of 2011”. Most of them suck horridly.

Not to say that I wouldn’t like to see this go somewhere - would be good to see a RSPS that isn’t leeched, made from tutorials, or sucks content wise.

That bein’ said, good luck. I’d be your “webmaster”, but my workload is full.

Thanks for your Opinion, But does every server have a registered domain, and paid for VPS. A Majority of Servers that do not Fail, I am not saying mine will be any better because it has the previously said mentioned, But it will show the players that we are responsible enough to bring fourth what they warrant.

Quite a lot of them do, actually, yes. Though I’ve yet to see anyone with forums they made themselves instead of using that SMF or VB crap.

I agree with you, But making your own custom forums without the help of any software, can be difficult for one person to do, Which is why I would need a development team for such cases.

It’s not as hard as you might think. It just takes time. I’ve made entire websites from scratch.

And honestly I prefer to do it alone. I don’t like other people messing with my codes.

I did not mean to state that there would be a team working on one Task, but individuals working on Their own Tasks.
[/quote]

I see, well good luck then.[/quote]

Thank-you, and best Regards to you, and what you are currently presuming.

Read full topic

I am not saying that all them have failed, If you Re-Read what has been stated, I said a majority of them do not. I am Saying they fall though do to the they cannot keep up the expectations. I was just mentioning as a fresh Server to start off with a Domain, and VPS is a Great Idea. Most of them fail due to the fact, they do not keep up to what they players would like.
